meanings.definition: A type of engineered wood product made from wood chips and resin.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used chipboards to build the shelves in the garage.
meanings.sent2: I bought some chipboards to repair the broken cabinet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used chipboards to build a tiny house in the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like chipboards, carefully crafted from memories and hopes.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh chipboards filled the workshop, reminding him of his childhood home.

meanings.definition: Boards made from compressed wood chips and resin.
meanings.sent1: We used chipboards to create a sturdy platform for the event.
meanings.sent2: The furniture was crafted from high-quality chipboards.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of a hat made of chipboards.
meanings.sent4: His words were like chipboards, strong and unyielding.
meanings.sent5: The sound of footsteps echoed on the chipboards, creating a rhythmic beat.
